div.p: YOUR BOOK REPORTS. THANKS.
AND FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. HELPING OUT YOUR KIDS AND
GRANDKIDS. MY FATHER ONLY GOT TWO WEEKS
VACATION A YEAR AND SINCE WE DIDN'T HAVE A LOT OF OF MONEY
WE TRAVELED FOR ONE WEEK, I SAY TRAVELED, WHAT WE DID WAS
GO TO A LAKE M VERMONT OR NEW HAMPSHIRE, AND IT WAS FUN.
I GOT TO APPRECIATE NEW ENGLAND.
IT WASN'T EXACTLY A LIFE ALTERING EXPERIENCE, NOW WHAT
I DO IS TAKE THE URCHINS SOMETIMES AGAINST THEIR WILL
TO EXOTIC PLACES TO LEARN SOMETHING.
LAST WEEK WE WENT TO ST. KITS. AND CAME TO THE COLONIES AND
THE REST IS HISTORY AS THEY SAY.
THE CULTURE OF THE ISLAND IS VERY INTERESTING COMBINATION
OF BRITISH, FRENCH AND AFRICAN.
WE HAD A GREAT TIME. THE BEAUTIFUL BEACH AND FOLKS
AT THE MARRIOTT FRIENDLY AND HUGE ON ST. KITTS, EVERYBODY
WATCHES. THIS SUMMER I'LL TAKE THEM TO
IRELAND. FAR FROM ST. KITTS.
IF YOU CAN TAKE THEM SOMEWHERE FASCINATING.
TIP OF THE DAY. CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR
WEBSITE DIFFERENT FROM BILL O'REILLY.COM.
